name: S.B.DEVI CHARITY HOME
briefDescription: S.B.Devi Charity Home is Located in Kolkata, West Bengal.This is a Kolkata based NGO serving the society silently for a decade.  S. B. Devi Charity Home, Kolkata and Foundation Calcutta Project Basel (University of Basel), Switzerland are joint development project.  It is primarily a charity home to serve the poor people. It is non-political, nonâ€“religious, non-profit making and fully private.  Through our programmes like Mother and child health care , Health check up programme for school children , Out Patient Clinic, Public Health in Prostitute Area, Konika Night Shelter we have seen many lives change for the better. Through our organization we are trying to make a difference to improve our society in different ways.
